          <title>
            <string language="de">Stefan Zweig über die Erwartungen an den Krieg</string>
            <string language="en">Stefan Zweig about  the expectations of war</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Stefan Zweig au sujet des espérances de la 
guerre</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Stefan Zweig sobre as expectativas da guerra</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Stefan Zweig circa le aspettative della guerra</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Θ*Στεφαν Zweig για τις προσδοκίες του πολέμου</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Stefan Zweig sobre las expectativas de la guerra</string>
          </title>
          <language>de</language>
          <description>
            <string language="de">Was erwarteten die Menschen 1914 vom Krieg? Fragen zu einem Textauszug aus Stefan Zweig: Die Welt von Gestern. Erinnerungen eines Europäers.</string>
            <string language="en">What did people expect from the war in 1914? Questions on an excerpt of a text written by Stefan Zweig: The world of Yesterday. Retrospections of a European</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="de">1. Weltkrieg</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="de">Krieg</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="de">Kriegsbegeisterung</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="de">Zweig, Stefan</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">1. World war</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">War</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">Enthusiasm for war</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">Zweig, Stefan</string>
          </keyword>
          <structure>
            <source>structureValues</source>
            <value>atomic</value>
          </structure>
          <aggregationLevel>
            <source>aggregationLevelValues</source>
            <value>1</value>
          </aggregationLevel>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Que les gens ont-ils attendu de la guerre en 1914
? Questions sur un extrait d'un texte écrit par Stefan Zweig : 
Le monde d'hier. Rétrospections d'un Européen</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Que os povos esperaram da guerra em 1914? 
Perguntas em um excerpt de um texto escrito por Stefan Zweig: 
O mundo de ontem. Retrospections de um europeu</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Che cosa la gente si è attesa dalla guerra in 
1914? Domande su un brano di un testo scritto da Stefan Zweig: 
Il mondo di ieri. Retrospections di un europeo</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Τι οι άνθρωποι ανέμειναν από τον πόλεμο το 1914; 
Ερωτήσεις σε ένα απόσπασμα ενός κειμένου που γράφεται από
το Stefan Zweig: Ο κόσμος του χθες. Ανασκοπήσεις 
του Ευρωπαίου</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">¿Qué la gente esperó de la guerra en 1914? 
Preguntas sobre un extracto de un texto escrito por Stefan 
Zweig: El mundo de ayer. Retrospections de un europeo</string>
          </description>
